casebody.head_matter:
534 A.2d 757
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Joel HENDERSON, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Nov. 11, 1987.

Robert P. Fulton, Philadelphia, for appellant.

Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, zappala and papadakos, jj.
